title: Delete steering config
custom_preconds:
1. After step#3, for the users belonging to OU/Group, exceptions from SC1 must be applied
2. After step#5, the same resources must not be bypassed at nsproxy i.e the exceptions from default steering config must be applied for the users from the same OU/Group
custom_steps:
1. Create an SC say SC1 for an OU/Group and add all types of exceptions to it
2. Add few other exceptions to default steering config as well
3. Access all types of exceptions from a user from SC1
4. Delete SC1
5. Access the same exceptions(from step #3) from a user belonging to SC1
6. Access all types of exceptions from a user belonging to default steering config
custom_expected:
1. After step#3, for the users belonging to OU/Group, exceptions from SC1 must be applied
2. After step#5, the same resources must not be bypassed at nsproxy i.e the exceptions from default steering config must be applied for the users from the same OU/Group
